attack_patterns.name: SeDebugPrivilege Abuse
attack_patterns.description: Abuse SeDebugPrivilege to manipulate process tokens

attack_patterns.name: Weak Service Permissions
attack_patterns.description: Exploit services with weak permissions or unquoted paths

attack_patterns.name: DLL Search Order Hijacking
attack_patterns.description: Place malicious DLL in writable directory searched before system DLLs

attack_patterns.name: UAC Bypass
attack_patterns.description: Bypass User Account Control to elevate privileges

attack_patterns.name: Registry Permission Abuse
attack_patterns.description: Exploit weak registry permissions for persistence or elevation
